amendment.description: To provide for a manufacturer's jobs credit, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3108 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3108 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S4752-4753; text: CR S4752-4753) To provide for a manufacturer's jobs credit, and for other purposes.
